des: "This sauce goes great on everything, fries, chicken tenders and on burgers to jazz it up. It's a simple 5 ingredient recipe your family and friends are sure to enjoy. It turns the ordinary and casual dish to an extraordinary, upscale meal."
ins: Blend together the mayonnaise, ranch dressing, horseradish, Worcestershire sauce, and garlic powder in a bowl. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
